name: Blind Mind
description: A mental patient and a psychologist
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported
